ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Newbie asking a question!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Kaos  To:  Sent: Saturday, March 30, 2002 8:20 PM Subject: [EverQuest] Newbie asking a question!!
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "Kaos" <kaoslord@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, March 30, 2002 8:20 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Newbie asking a question!!


> I have only been playing a month and I am wondering where do you find
magic
> weapons in this game...My two main characters are a 11th level Barbarian
> Warrior and a 9th level Half elf Bard.....any help would be great....by
the
> way plz dont say buy it from other players...I dont have much in PP's
>
> Thnx alot

You can probably pick up Velium Weapons off players for 5-10pp (sell a few
stacks of bonechips or batwings to the players who are shouting to buy
them). Otherwise you need to either buy them from vendors (usually at
exorbitant prices), fight Mobs that drop them, or Quest for one. Your barb
could try doing the langseax quest from the warrior guild in Halas, as for
your bard it will depend where he is.

Honig Wayfarer
46 Ranger
Cazic Thule
